text:
Even now, to some, the President's words matter. A 30,000 jump in Rx's for #Chloroquine after #Trump says "Take it! What do you have to lose?" 

Then a spike in calls to #PoisonControl after he suggests #bleach, "sarcastically" (or, as most of us call it, "ignorant & reckless"). https://t.co/yVRBCd3jwM
